directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F.  In large mixing bowl, beat hot sweet potatoes with butter until smooth. Add remaining ingredients except crust; mix well. Pour into pie shell. Bake 40 minutes or until golden brown. Cool. Garnish as desired.
ingredients: 1 pound sweet potatoes, cooked and peeled
1 (14 ounce) can EAGLE BRAND® Sweetened Condensed Milk
title: Sweet Potato Pie from EAGLE BRAND®
